CustomField.formula: Quotation__r.Charge_Bucket_1_Amount__c + Quotation__r.Charge_Bucket_2_Amount__c + Quotation__r.Charge_Bucket_3_Amount__c + Quotation__r.Charge_Bucket_1_Total_GST__c + Quotation__r.Charge_Bucket_2_Total_GST__c + Quotation__r.Charge_Bucket_3_Total_GST__c
CustomField.label: All Inclusive Amount
